info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued August 7 at 4:12AM CDT until August 7 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth MN
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog this morning. For the Extreme Heat Watch, dangerously hot and very humid conditions with heat index values around 100 possible Friday afternoon and evening.
* WHERE...Pine County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, Hinckley and, Lena Lake areas.
* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 8 AM CDT this morning. For the Extreme Heat Watch, from Friday afternoon through Friday evening.
* IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat and high humidity events. Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction:
Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights and fog lights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

parameter.value: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...EXTREME HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
